abstract.p: Correction of picture caption Feb 4 about Pres Bush's visit to National Institutes of Health Vaccine Research Center, regarding what he was examining under microscope

block.p: A picture caption on Feb. 4 about an appearance by President Bush at the National Institutes of Health Vaccine Research Center in Bethesda, Md., gave an erroneous identification from the White House for the specimen he examined under a microscope. It was human kidney cells modified with fragments of the Ebola virus, not Ebola cells. A reader's letter reported the error soon after publication; this correction awaited confirmation from the National Institutes of Health, which delayed its response.
